summary: DAR AL CODE HR OS - Iteration 9: Complete UI/UX Redesign Testing. All features verified working correctly: (1) New gradient hero card with Navy Blue to Lavender gradient, (2) Quick actions/services grid with colored icons, (3) Mobile bottom navigation with active item highlighting, (4) Language toggle working between English/Arabic, (5) RTL layout correctly applied in Arabic mode, (6) Transactions page shows approve/reject buttons for authorized users (STAS), (7) Attendance page shows check-in/out buttons and admin table with employee data, (8) Dark theme toggle working correctly.
